name: Risk Dice Roll Generator
description:
Risk 

The famous world domination strategy game is now easier than ever with this brand new application! This app has every feature you need when entering the battle phase in Risk by having a Manual and Automatic mode setting. 

Manual:

In the manual setting, you can manually select how many troops are attacking and defending in a specific battle. It then performs a random dice roll and from that roll, automatically determines who lost pieces in that exchange. After you get your results, you can continue to roll as many times as you want at your leisure.

Automatic:

In the automatic setting, you can easily automate battles that involve large amounts of attackers and/or defenders. By selecting how many total attacking and defending troops there are in the upcoming battle, the application will continually perform 1 v 1 battles against the troops until one side is left standing. 

I selected the setting, now what?

Once you select the mode you want, simply press the spacebar key or press the on screen "GO!" button and you are ready to conquer the world!
